summary: This document is an internal email chain from September 4, 2019, discussing a New York Post article about an anonymous 'John Doe' who is petitioning a judge to keep names sealed in a civil lawsuit related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email forwards the article link and anticipates questions about the identity of John Doe.

persons.name: John Doe
persons.context: An anonymous individual who has filed a request with a judge to prevent the public naming of individuals in a civil lawsuit connected to the Epstein case.

events.title: John Doe's petition to judge
events.description: An anonymous John Doe begs a judge not to publicly name individuals listed in a civil lawsuit brought by an Epstein accuser.

keyFacts: An anonymous 'John Doe' is petitioning a judge to keep names sealed in a civil lawsuit related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The civil suit was brought by an accuser who has named a long list of individuals.
The document is an internal email from the FBI New York field office discussing a New York Post article about the petition.
